original: 《 編成 》　　　　軍團出征每日吃糧量與兵種相關：　　　　步兵 1~4 單位，騎兵 4~7 單位，　　　　象兵、車械 7~10 單位；　　　　歷史名軍戰力高，會再耗用更多糧草。
text: "Compilation" 　　　　The daily food intake of the army is related to the arms:  　　　　 infantry 1~4 units, cavalry 4~7 units, 　　　　horse, vehicles and more expensive military force, historically more military force:  7~10 forage.
